definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Pray for your Ministries, Please send me information.
sentences.chinese: 为贵会代祷，请寄上代祷资料。

sentences.english: Even Bujing Yun and martial arts myth of previous generations has become a nameless prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 就连步惊云及上代武林神话无名亦成为阶下囚。

sentences.english: Compared with the private gardens of the preceding dynasties, the art of private gardens of Tang Changan had been enhanced.
sentences.chinese: 唐长安私家园林的艺术性较之上代又有进一步升华。

sentences.english: This is the first Kindle that's not as good as the one it replaces.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一代没有上代好的Kindle。

definition: secondary/twice in the year (of generations of insects, harvests etc)
three generations of a family/the three earliest dynasties (Xia, Shang and Zhou)
to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
